headline: CrowdStrike Named a Customers’ Choice in the 2026 Gartner Peer Insights™ ‘Voice of the Customer’ for Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) Tools Report
summary: AUSTIN, Texas, February 03, 2026--CrowdStrike (NASDAQ: CRWD) today announced its recognition as a Customers’ Choice in the 2026 Gartner Peer Insights™ ‘Voice of the Customer’ for Application Security Posture Management (ASPM) Tools report.1 CrowdStrike received the top customer ratings across product capabilities and highest rating for deployment experience of all the vendors evaluated. CrowdStrike eliminates application risk and consolidates cloud security at scale – reducing costs and complexi
